languages.text: "Соратники и соратницы, давайте поднимем кубки, и пусть то, что плещется в них, смоет скорбь с ваших душ, как чистые воды смывают грязь и песок с тела усталого путника, коему Великий послал звенящий хрустальными ручьями оазис!"

"Brothers and sisters in arms, let's raise our glasses, and may what splashes in them wash the sorrow from our souls as clear waters wash the dirt and sand from the body of a weary traveller to whom the Exalted One has sent an oasis glittering with crystal streams!"
languages.original_text: "Соратники и соратницы, давайте поднимем кубки, и пусть то, что плещется в них, смоет скорбь с ваших душ, как чистые воды смывают грязь и песок с тела усталого путника, коему Великий послал звенящий хрустальными ручьями оазис!"

traits.locale_text: "Brothers and sisters in arms, let's raise our glasses, and may what splashes in them wash the sorrow from our souls as clear waters wash the dirt and sand from the body of a weary traveller to whom the Exalted One has sent an oasis glittering with crystal streams!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Brothers and sisters in arms, let's raise our glasses, and may what splashes in them wash the sorrow from our souls as clear waters wash the dirt and sand from the body of a weary traveller to whom the Exalted One has sent an oasis glittering with crystal streams!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “兄弟们、姐妹们，举起酒杯吧！愿酒杯中溅起的酒花，涤荡我们灵魂中的痛苦，如同清澈的河水洗净疲惫旅人身上的泥沙一样！赞美至高无上的神皇，祂亲自为我们送来了溪水潺潺的绿洲！”
languages.original_text: "Brothers and sisters in arms, let's raise our glasses, and may what splashes in them wash the sorrow from our souls as clear waters wash the dirt and sand from the body of a weary traveller to whom the Exalted One has sent an oasis glittering with crystal streams!"

traits.locale_text: “兄弟们、姐妹们，举起酒杯吧！愿酒杯中溅起的酒花，涤荡我们灵魂中的痛苦，如同清澈的河水洗净疲惫旅人身上的泥沙一样！赞美至高无上的神皇，祂亲自为我们送来了溪水潺潺的绿洲！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「戦友たちよ、グラスを掲げよう。そして、そのグラスに飛び散る水しぶきが、アタシたちの魂から悲しみを洗い流してくれますように。エグザルテッド・ワンが、水晶の流れがきらめくオアシスを送ってくださった、疲れ果てた旅人の体から汚れや砂を清らかな水が洗い流してくれるように！」
languages.original_text: "Brothers and sisters in arms, let's raise our glasses, and may what splashes in them wash the sorrow from our souls as clear waters wash the dirt and sand from the body of a weary traveller to whom the Exalted One has sent an oasis glittering with crystal streams!"

traits.locale_text: 「戦友たちよ、グラスを掲げよう。そして、そのグラスに飛び散る水しぶきが、アタシたちの魂から悲しみを洗い流してくれますように。エグザルテッド・ワンが、水晶の流れがきらめくオアシスを送ってくださった、疲れ果てた旅人の体から汚れや砂を清らかな水が洗い流してくれるように！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Hermanos y hermanas de armas, ¡levantemos nuestras copas y dejemos que lo que las llena lave el pesar de nuestras almas como las aguas prístinas limpian la suciedad y la arena del cuerpo de un viajero exhausto a quien el Exaltado ha guiado a un oasis cristalino!».
languages.original_text: "Brothers and sisters in arms, let's raise our glasses, and may what splashes in them wash the sorrow from our souls as clear waters wash the dirt and sand from the body of a weary traveller to whom the Exalted One has sent an oasis glittering with crystal streams!"

traits.locale_text: «Hermanos y hermanas de armas, ¡levantemos nuestras copas y dejemos que lo que las llena lave el pesar de nuestras almas como las aguas prístinas limpian la suciedad y la arena del cuerpo de un viajero exhausto a quien el Exaltado ha guiado a un oasis cristalino!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Trinquons, mes frères et sœurs d'armes ! Puisse le contenu de nos verres chasser la tristesse qui pèse sur nos âmes, aussi bien que l'eau claire nettoie la crasse et le sable sur le corps du voyageur fatigué à qui l'Exalté a envoyé une oasis aux ruisseaux cristallins ! »
languages.original_text: "Brothers and sisters in arms, let's raise our glasses, and may what splashes in them wash the sorrow from our souls as clear waters wash the dirt and sand from the body of a weary traveller to whom the Exalted One has sent an oasis glittering with crystal streams!"

traits.locale_text: « Trinquons, mes frères et sœurs d'armes ! Puisse le contenu de nos verres chasser la tristesse qui pèse sur nos âmes, aussi bien que l'eau claire nettoie la crasse et le sable sur le corps du voyageur fatigué à qui l'Exalté a envoyé une oasis aux ruisseaux cristallins ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Waffenbrüder und -schwestern, lasst uns unsere Gläser erheben, und möge uns ihr Inhalt den Kummer von den Seelen waschen, so wie klares Wasser Schmutz und Sand vom Körper eines müden Reisenden wäscht. So als hätte uns der Erhabene eine Oase mit kristallklaren Bächen geschenkt!"
languages.original_text: "Brothers and sisters in arms, let's raise our glasses, and may what splashes in them wash the sorrow from our souls as clear waters wash the dirt and sand from the body of a weary traveller to whom the Exalted One has sent an oasis glittering with crystal streams!"

traits.locale_text: "Waffenbrüder und -schwestern, lasst uns unsere Gläser erheben, und möge uns ihr Inhalt den Kummer von den Seelen waschen, so wie klares Wasser Schmutz und Sand vom Körper eines müden Reisenden wäscht. So als hätte uns der Erhabene eine Oase mit kristallklaren Bächen geschenkt!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Silah arkadaşlarım, kardeşlerim, kadehlerimizi kaldıralım ve içlerindeki damlalar; yorgun bir yolcunun bedenini kirden ve kumdan arındıran, Görkemli'nin o yolcuya gönderdiği vahanın pırıl pırıl, tertemiz suları gibi ruhlarımızdaki hüznü yıkayıp temizlesin!"
languages.original_text: "Brothers and sisters in arms, let's raise our glasses, and may what splashes in them wash the sorrow from our souls as clear waters wash the dirt and sand from the body of a weary traveller to whom the Exalted One has sent an oasis glittering with crystal streams!"

traits.locale_text: "Silah arkadaşlarım, kardeşlerim, kadehlerimizi kaldıralım ve içlerindeki damlalar, yorgun bir yolcunun bedenini kirden ve kumdan arındıran, Görkemli'nin o yolcuya gönderdiği vahanın pırıl pırıl, tertemiz suları gibi ruhlarımızdaki hüznü yıkayıp temizlesin!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
